page.title: 16Royal Darroch Hotel 2
page.content: Three joiners were driving past in a small van when the Royal Darroch exploded.They thought the van had been hit from behind but it was really the force of the explosion. One hundred yards across the road the windows in Cults library were shattered by flying debris.Cars parked in Royal Darroch Hotel car park were extensivley damaged and the hotel mini bus was overturned. Steven Cambell woke to be blown out of bed by the force of the explosion.By mid morning the fire was under control but people were still lining the street unable to belive what had happened.Ten ambulances were needed and a special team of doctors were brought to the scene to help the injured outside the hotel.Most of the injured had burns and blast wounds.
